Write briefly about yourself before you proceed with the Test Topic.

My name is srujana,  i am honest and hardworking, and very patience. i am good at observation, and good at typing and good at problem solving,  my technical skills including internet savvy and MS office and accounting packages:TALLY, BUSY, FOCUS.


More than one billion Indians: Is this is a problem or a sea of opportunities? Please take a stand and discuss

Over population is not good for any country,because if population is increasing job opportunities will not get for all,over population leads to unemployment, if employment is not good in the country autometically country position is not good to comparing to other countries.

More than one billion indians its much hike population, if population is hike we are not able to give all services to the all peoples in the nation, to over come any problems regarding the unemployment,governement will take a good stratagy for all peoples to get employment,

If population is incresing some problems will rise that was separation of states, and will serve the nation by deviding, and all states peoples will satisfy for what the government is giving services.
